text: Veronica se întoarce (Veronica Returns) is a 1973 Romanian fantasy musical movie directed by Elisabeta Bostan and is the sequel to the 1972 movie Veronica. It stars Lulu Mihaescu, Margareta Pîslaru, Dem Radulescu, Angela Moldovan. ==Other websites== * Category:1973 fantasy movies Category:1973 musical movies Category:Romanian movies Category:Sequel movies Category:Movies directed by Elisabeta Bostan
title: Veronica se întoarce
